document_data.name: Mount Thorog
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Thorog''' was one of the two tallest mountains east from the [[Moon Pass]].
document_data.History: The mountain peak was named after a deceased [[orc]] chieftain.
document_data.Geography: Thorog was located between [[Stone Stand]] and the stronghold of [[Hellgate Keep]].  Guarded by [[peryton]]s, [[Telkoun's Tower]] was a fortress located between [[Mount Ieldroun]] and Mount Thorog.
